name: Pro 8Ball Pool World League
description:
Pro8 Ball World Leaugue is the ultimate online Pool tournament. Compete at different venues around the world for real prizes.

- Featuring Realistic Game Play
- Custom Cues & Tables
- Online Tournaments
- Real Cash Prizes *Where available

Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

Don’t miss out on the latest news:

Like ePlay Studios: http://facebook.com/eplaystudios
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/eplaystudios
